Articles.Content:
False, never got a plane into orbit.

The next user is male

True.

The user below me has been playing KSP since 0.11 like me.

Flase. .10

The user below me has far to many mods in there KSP game.

False, I have 0 mods.

Teh user below me has been using my almost-updated programs.

No.

The user below me has been playing KSP since 1.20.2

Yep, I started in 0.19.1

The user below me is not american

True.

User below me is Flixxbeatz.

True. How did you know?

User below me isn't that awesome.

False, a small bit of my awesomeness was removed from me and sent into space. You commonly refer to it as the sun

User below me has eaten an ice cream sandwich.

True, never said when.

The user below me would be kind enough to buy me CS:S and Gmod on steam while it is ~$13

Edited July 12, 2013 by Galacticruler

False, I'm broke and and don't like CS

The user below me is >23 Years old

True.

REPOST GO!

The user below me would be kind enough to buy me CS:S and Gmod on steam while it is ~$13

Where are you then?

@Flixxbeats: You are answering yourself. I don't think that's allowed.

The next user knows their exact location. (i.e. Sunnyvale, CA, USA)

Of course, undisclosed location is Austria

The user below me has seen

. (before me linking it)

Yep, on The Colbert Report of all things.

The user below me thinks that the Pathfinder/Sojourner combination was better than Skycrane/Curiosity.

No, I liked Curiosity more.

The user below me has watched at least one of Scott Manley's videos.

Yep!

The user below me likes sushi

I like California Rolls, but I don't like fish so I guess false.

The user below me has an unorganized desk/computer space.

I like California Rolls, but I don't like fish so I guess false.

The user below me has an unorganized desk/computer space.

Partially.

The next user thinks they need something.

Well, now I do, but I don't know what.

The user below me has used a spoon.

No. I need no spoons.

The user below me has experienced sleep paralysis.

Many times already, especially when I am sleepy/tired as hell where I once experienced 2 consecutive episodes.

User below me is sleepwalking.

False.

The user below me is excited about the Steam Summer Sale.

True.

The user below me is false.

False. But also true. But also false. But also true. But also false. But also.....

The user below me is traped in a infinit loop.
